subject: Disabilities
Hockey, Ice
Sleds
Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers, sponsored in part by the N.H.L.’s Rangers, are one of six teams in the Northeast Sled Hockey League, which caters to athletes with mobility limitations.
snippet: The Rangers, sponsored in part by the N.H.L.’s Rangers, are one of six teams in the Northeast Sled Hockey League, which caters to athletes with mobility limitations.
